Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The LUMO of P1 is higher than that of poly[thiopheneimide-alt-benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene ] ( -3.6 eV ) , 20 indicating that the electron - withdrawing ability of dithieno[3,2-f : 2^0 ,3 0 -h]phthalimide is weaker than that of thiophene imide ( 4 , Figure 1 ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[thiopheneimide-alt-benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene] |
| dithieno[3,2-f : 2^0 ,3 0 -h]phthalimide |
| thiophene imide |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

I apologize for the mistake in my previous response. Here are the valid entities in the paragraph that clearly refer to "Material Name" presented as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| Material Name |
| --- |
| poly[thiopheneimide-alt-benzo[1,2-b:4,5-b 0 ]dithiophene] |
| dithieno[3,2-f : 2^0 ,3 0 -h]phthalimide |

I removed "thiophene imide" from the list as it is not a specific material name, but rather a general class of materials.
